description: Made with a water-resistant, durable, and breathable textured shell, these high-quality kids' winter mitts will become your child's new best friend - and your lifesaver this winter! Thanks to the extra-long zippered storm cuff, zipper puller, and red thumb lining for easy guidance, they slip on so effortlessly you won’t dread getting your child ready anymore. The PRIMALOFT® Gold P.U.R.E.™ recycled, breathable, and water-resistant insulation, GORE-TEX® membrane, and moisture-wicking, antimicrobial wool-blend lining provide optimal warmth so your child can jump in the snow hands-first. Featuring reflective components, these mitts are also great for skiing!<br><br>The Best Friend kids’ mitts rank 4 on our warmth level scale.
name: The Best Friend Mitts - Child
